column5: Hey Folks,  Been searching the internet for almost 1hr looking for some sort of "Assembly" diagram on this reel.  Was out at one of my fav. tribs... was using my Centrepin for no more than 45min... heard some sort of stuff on the inside. At some points, it drastically affected the 'free floating' action of the reel.... I wanna lube this thing up before the run REALLY picks up....Here is what the reel looks like. OH! I should mention its NOT the XL version.. (Though mechanically they're identical). Then again, so are pretty much every float reel on the market!  Anyway - here they are the pics...
Nevermind - MODS PLEASE DELETE THIS.... Just emailed RAVENTACKLE... Hopefully get a response soon.
this should be the link you need. Matrix Schematic
